item.description:
This time I'll talk about the bi-directional data binding features introduced in Flex 4. Open Q&A will follow, as always.

You can join in at http://experts.na3.ac...

Check what time this occurs in your time zone at:
http://www.timeanddat...


LOGGING IN: When you login to the Connect room (the http://experts.na3.ac... link above) to view the meeting, PLEASE USE THE "LOGIN AS GUEST" option, and USE YOUR NAME, but do NOT attempt to use your meetup.com username/password or any Connect account. Just sign in as a guest.


ADD THIS TO YOUR CALENDAR: Want to add this event to your own personal calendar? Click the link
on the top of the event page, below the event title, saying, "Export to a calendar", which offers
calendar downloads for Outlook, iCal, Google, and Yahoo calendars.
item.name: 2 Way Data Binding in Flex 4 Flextras Friday Lunch
